title: Teaching Method Practical Competency Enhancement: Teacher Emotion Management Strategies in Online Educational Environments

context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three teacher emotions (satisfaction, relief, enjoyment) that occur during online class design.
Learners can produce elementary mathematics education modules by applying knowledge-building approach (KBA)-based instructional design principles.
Learners can establish strategies to reduce at least two job stress factors for teachers by strengthening learner support roles.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
